title: @Meddler Demacian Justice and Kled
body:
How does Demacian justice interact with the second HP bar? Does it deal %missing HP of both bars or does it prioritize one HP bar over the other?

IOW, is Demacian justice a piece of shit against Kled or does it take into account both bars as if they were one?

replies.body: % health based effects treat both Kled and Skaarl's health combined as one giant bar. That means % current health abilities are great choices for forcing a dismount, executes are great at preventing a remount.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FEBWZ0E8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-25T22:28:25.863+0000)
>
> % health based effects treat both Kled and Skaarl's health combined as one giant bar. That means % current health abilities are great choices for forcing a dismount, executes are great at preventing a remount.

Sweet. In light of that, is there any news on balance changes for champions like {{champion:86}} {{champion:75}} who have been struggling to stay afloat in season 6?

Would be nice to take {{champion:86}} especially in platinum ranked without feeling like a troll who is gimping his team.

As it is right now, the only real viable juggernauts left are {{champion:122}} {{champion:420}}

(and we shan't speak of the failed experiment's name {{champion:82}})

He answered your question, you don't need to ask a second question just because he did.

Also, each juggernaut may feel weak, doesn't mean they are. It *could* mean they are, but it isn't certain.

If you have extra questions, address it in another thread.
